== Ubuntu Usage of Micro Blogs ==

This was created in the hopes of providing a quick and easy means of finding Twitter, Identi.ca, and other Microblog accounts that provide reliable information on and about Ubuntu Linux. However this is not for linking to Individual Ubuntu User Accounts. When you're tweet/denting about your team or something your team is involved in, use the hashtag #locoteams.
